__EVENTVALIDATION

div.span: All Upper Arlington Schools facilities are closed to visitors until at least May 1. Any previously scheduled events or activities, including athletics, are postponed or canceled until then as well. Please visit www.uaschools.org for more information on COVID-19 updates and precautions.

1950 North Mallway Drive
Upper Arlington, OH 43221
Hours: 7:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Monday-Friday
Phone: (614) 487-5000
